qas.question: What year was Arnold J toynbee becoming metaphysical about the Near East?
Who was the Hegelesque historian of civilization?

answers.text: Geography alone was not a sufficient explanation of the terms

context: By <a0_0>1916<a0_0/>, when millions of Europeans were becoming casualties of imperial war in the trenches of eastern and western Europe over "the eastern question," <a1_0>Arnold J. Toynbee<a1_0/>, Hegelesque historian of civilization at large, was becoming metaphysical about the Near East. <a2_0>Geography alone was not a sufficient explanation of the terms<a2_0/>, he believed. If the Ottoman Empire had been a sick man, then:
